lines.text: create long long p , x , c , num , mod with x = 1 , c = 0 , num = 1
lines.code: long long p , x = 1 , c = 0 , num = 1 , mod ;

lines.text: for long long i = 1 to p - 1 with increment i
lines.code: for ( long long i = 1 ; i < p ; i ++ )

lines.text: for long long j = 1 to p - 2 with increment j
lines.code: for ( long long j = 1 ; j <= p - 2 ; j ++ )

lines.text: if num - 1 modulo p is equal to 0 then
set num to ( ( num modulo mod ) * ( i modulo mod ) ) modulo mod
lines.code: num = ( ( num % mod ) * ( i % mod ) ) % mod ;

lines.text: if num - 1 modulo p is equal to 0 then increment c
